testcase.name: Add a Rule to the RuleProcessor
testcase.system-out: Given the RuleProcessor instance is up and running..........................passed And I add a new Rule........................................................passed Then the New Rule is listed in RuleProcessor rules list.....................passed

testcase.name: Retrieve a non existing Rule from the RuleProcessor
testcase.system-out: Given the RuleProcessor instance is up and running..........................passed And I try to get an unknown Role............................................passed Then the UnknownRuleException is raised.....................................passed

testcase.name: Remove a Rule
testcase.system-out: Given the RuleProcessor instance is up and running..........................passed And I remove a Rule named "test-rule".......................................passed Then the "test-rule" Rule does not exists anymore...........................passed

testcase.name: Add a RuleSet
testcase.system-out: Given the RuleProcessor instance is up and running..........................passed And I add a new RuleSet.....................................................passed Then the New RuleSet is listed in RuleProcessor ruleSet list................passed

testcase.name: Retrieve a non existing RuleSet from the RuleProcessor
testcase.system-out: Given the RuleProcessor instance is up and running..........................passed And I try to get an "unknown" RuleSet.......................................passed Then the UnknownRuleSetException is raised..................................passed

testcase.name: Remove a RuleSet
testcase.system-out: Given the RuleProcessor instance is up and running..........................passed And I remove a RuleSet named "test-ruleset".................................passed Then the set of Rules "test-ruleset" does not exists anymore................passed

testcase.name: Add a RuleProcessor
testcase.system-out: Given the RuleEngine is up and running with maxPoolSize="1".................passed And I create a new RuleProcessor............................................passed And I add a RuleSet named "test"............................................passed And I add MyRule to the RuleSet "test"......................................passed And I create a new JsonObject with "{'name':'myObject','age':25, 'weight':78,'height':170,'date':'2018-09-13 12:00:00.00T000','status':'unknown'}".passed Then Submit the RuleProcessor to the RuleEngine.............................passed And The JsonObject named "myObject" is processed and the status is "done"...passed

testcase.name: Create and feed an object to RuleEngine
